verbose_text: By contrast, if iRhom2 phosphorylation mutants were misfolded, their retention in the ER and degradation by ER associated degradation (ERAD) would cause the loss of their essential TACE trafficking function, blocking TACE maturation.
evidence: ER and degradation by ER-associated degradation (ERAD) would cause the loss of their essential TACE trafficking function, blocking TACE
